text: Peter Polansky was the defending champion but lost in the semifinals to Yasutaka Uchiyama. Ernesto Escobedo won the title after defeating Uchiyama 7–6(7–5), 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Challenger Banque Nationale de Granby - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 Challenger Banque Nationale de Granby – Men's Singles
